long_description: The full-featured Kelty Transit 3.0 child carrier sports a small frame and sleek lines that make it ideal for crowded farmers markets, festivals, narrow trails and other tight surroundings. Adult harness features easy torso-length adjustment and laminated, padded and contoured hipbelt and shoulder straps. Child cockpit features height-adjustable seat, foot stabilizer, toy loops and a removable, washable chin pad. The Kelty Transit 3.0 child carrier has a generous storage compartment, hipbelt pockets, side bottle pocket, diaper-changing pad and sun hood.
short_description: The full-featured Kelty Transit 3.0 child carrier sports a small frame and sleek lines that make it ideal for crowded farmers markets, festivals, narrow trails and other tight surroundings.
